meanings: Adjective 사용된, 이용된; 써서 낡은, 헌, 중고의.

vlive.korean: 나 익숙해졌거든? - 그래요? I've gotten used to it. - Have you? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 웃지마요 찍찍🐭
vlive.english: I've gotten used to it. - Have you?

vlive.korean: 이 펭귄을 좋아했었는데 - 아델리펭귄? I used to like this penguin. - Adelie penguins? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 🐥🐸🍨
vlive.english: I used to like this penguin. - Adelie penguins?

vlive.korean: 아까 했던 거 - 오? 나 방금 뭐 했는지 기억이 안 나 이거였나? The previous one. - I forgot what I used. This? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IZ*ONE] 꿀물즈의 오늘도 감자한 라이브🥔❣️ (CHAEYEON&YURI talking about a story of the past)
vlive.english: The previous one. - I forgot what I used. This?

vlive.korean: [드디어 만난 증고거래 판매자] 근데 원래 이렇게 시간 자주 미루고 그러세요? [Finally meeting the used goods dealer] Do you often change the appointment time? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 정신차려보니 나만 보는 잘생긴 또라이랑 썸 타는 중;; [인서울2] - 철또하림 모음.zip
vlive.english: [Finally meeting the used goods dealer] Do you often change the appointment time?

vlive.korean: [한 시간 더 늦을 거 같다는 중고거래 판매자] 한 시간만 더 늦춰달라는데? [The used goods dealer is 1 hour late] He's asking whether we can meet an hour later. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 정신차려보니 나만 보는 잘생긴 또라이랑 썸 타는 중;; [인서울2] - 철또하림 모음.zip
vlive.english: [The used goods dealer is 1 hour late] He's asking whether we can meet an hour later.

examples.korean: This tool is used for shaping wood. 발음듣기 이 도구는 나무의 형태를 만드는 데 쓰인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This tool is used for shaping wood. 발음

examples.korean: The hostages were used as a human shield. 발음듣기 그 인질들이 인간 방패로 이용되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hostages were used as a human shield. 발음

examples.korean: He used his position to enrich himself. 발음듣기 그는 자기 지위를 이용하여 부를 축적했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He used his position to enrich himself. 발음

examples.korean: The weapon used in the raid was a replica. 발음듣기 그 습격 때 사용된 무기는 모형이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The weapon used in the raid was a replica. 발음

examples.korean: A pair of oxen, yoked together, was used. 발음듣기 함께 멍에를 씌운 한 쌍의 소가 이용되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A pair of oxen, yoked together, was used. 발음
